original_text: When Jesus taught them, he showed that he had authority. That was not like the way that the teachers of God's Law taught people.
korean_text: 이는 그 가르치시는 것이 권위 있는 자와 같고 그들의 서기관들과 같지 아니함일러라

sentences.original_text: he showed that he had authority
That was not like the way
that the teachers of God's Law taught people
